features: ✅ STAINLESS STEEL CHEF KNIFE - Classic stainless steel chef knife is made of 100% stainless steel which is rust and tarnish-resistant.
✅ EXCEPTIONAL CUT - Sharp blade cuts easily through large pieces of food
✅ EASY GRIP - ABS + 430 handle ensures easy grip and hassle-free maneuvering
✅ EASY TO USE - Conservative blade thickness of 2.5 mm and elite design allow for easy handheld use
✅ DISHWASHER-SAFE - Dishwasher safe; hand washing is recommended to retain the fine quality of the blade

✅ SUPPORT SERVICES - We provide a 100% satisfactory hassle-free replacement guarantee. We provide a lifetime and a full range of customer support services, you can trust us and buy our products without hesitation.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: From the brand Morning Chef offers a wide selection of high-quality cutlery lines to suit all kitchen purposes. From classic styles to modern, all our products feature outstanding edge retention, full resistance, and ergonomically designed handles.

From the brand Morning Chef offers a wide selection of high-quality cutlery lines to suit all kitchen purposes. From classic styles to modern, all our products feature outstanding edge retention, full resistance, and ergonomically designed handles.
PROFESSIONAL ALL-FUNCTIONS CHEF'S KNIFE A Superior Steel Chef Knife that Gives You a Reason to Enjoy Cooking
Versatile and Classy Multi-functional knife The Morning chef's knife is suitable for most cutting applications in the kitchen. It is also quite classy thanks to its modern design.

About Morning Chef Morning Chef is a professional kitchen knife brand on the block manufacturing all kinds of knives and kitchen tools. The high-quality kitchen knives series are manufactured from high-carbon stainless steel, steel with stunning beautiful yet comfortable handles that are designed for professionals who include chefs, culinary experts, food caterers as well as ordinary people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow just wow
reviews.reviewText: Can I just say that for the 6 bucks I spent, I am beyond impressed. It's no Japanese knife but people need to understand for the price you pay this knife is freaking amazing. Also remember people if you want your stuff to last take care of it. Don't just store it wet and expect it to remain in new condition. Could it rust, sure. You also paid like 6 bucks so don't expect the quality of a multi hundred dollar knife. You get what you pay for and for what you pay this is an incredible knife. Stay humble. Peace and love ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid And Sharp Kitchen Knife
reviews.reviewText: One piece construction- no rivets to come loose - this knife has so far done its job well. It's a larger knife and chops root veggies great and also slices meats perfectly well. For a lower priced kitchen knife it's kind of a pleasure to use. It cleans up super easy and polishes nicely for next time needed. Its handle fits well in my smaller hand grip and its hefty enough to keep control over. It's very sharp. So far. It's been a good addition to my kitchen cutlery without paying lots of $$.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking knife
reviews.reviewText: But right out of the box I washed it and tried to use it. But it was not very sharp so hubby used sharpener on it. Still not impressed but like that it came with tip protector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars turning colors already
reviews.reviewText: i haven’t had it that long and the handle and blade is already changing colors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for a good knife
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for a chef's knife to add to your kitchen utensils, you can't go wrong with this knife. Frankly, I think any one who has to cook should have a chef's knife.I'm no knife expert so I'm not sure i'm using the right lingo but I'll try to explain why I think this is a great knife. My experience with chef's knives is limited. I only have one other knife which is a really nice (and expensive) 10 inch German Wusthof knife that was gifted to me about 30 years ago. It's still going strong but I wanted to get a secondary chef's knife because another person in my household has decided to use that knife to de-skin and de-bone meat which infuriates me because it was rapidly dulling the edge.Anyway, this product is well made. It seems to be of good quality. The knife is made from one piece of steel which includes the handle instead of having a separate handle. It feels good and balanced when handling and using it. The knife edge came very sharp. Honestly I was worried that a lower-priced knife would be poorly made and dull so I was very pleasantly surprised.I'm sure other more knowledgeable or professional people can expound on the many other great features of this knife but from my lay(wo)man's view, this is a GREAT knife for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp knife, holds an edge
reviews.reviewText: I really like this chef's knife. It appears to be made from a single piece of stainless steel, with the transition from the blade to the handle appearing to be seamless. The knife is actually a bit lighter than what you initially think it will be when you first pick it up. The knife came with a very nice edge, and has quickly become a favorite "go to" knife when either myself or my wife are preparing meals. So far, after a few weeks of using this chef's knife, we have yet found the necessity to re-sharpen the blade, as it still cuts very well, even after multiple trips through the dish washer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp no frills budget knife
reviews.reviewText: The most important thing is it's sharp and cuts well. Not sure how long it will hold it's edge, but for now it's great. It's very basic so not something you want to have on display, but I do enjoy the face that it's solid stainless steel so I can throw it in the dishwasher and not worry about the handle getting damaged, and hopefully no rust or discoloration. I know you're not supposed to put kitchen knives in the dishwasher, but I'm a bit OCD when it comes to cleanliness and germs. I won't throw my high end knives with handles made from wood or other premium materials in the dishwasher, so this one will get lots of use from me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's cheap but it does the job
reviews.reviewText: For a $10 knife,I really can't complain a whole lot.It looks nice but clearly lower quality steel.The handle is also hollow.It is plenty sharp out of the box and has worked for my needs so far.Its hard to say anything negative because again,its only $10.You can't expect top quality for that price and won't get top quality for that price.But what you do get is a nice looking knife that's sharp and gets the job done.
